content: offering an instant pdf crochet pattern to make super fast and easy moss stitch baby blanket this is the perfect last minute baby shower gift approximate finished size is 30 x 32 materials needed caron cinnamon swirl cakes yarn crochet hook size 7 4 5mm tapestry needle pattern is written in english using standard american terms the pattern and photographs of this design are the property of crochet with gabriella rose this pattern and design are subject to copyright and are for personal non-commercial use only you may not distribute or sell this pattern under any circumstances due to the nature of the product there will be no refunds after purchase
